section.title: freight classes creating new Freight Class
section.para: To create a new Freight Class, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: Create your Freight Classes using a logical, hierarchical structure. This will make it easier to retrieve Freight Class information in the future.

section.para: When creating a new Freight Class, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique code to identify the Freight Class.
Enter a description to further identify the Freight Class.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Freight Class, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Class Code and adds it to the master list of Freight Classes.
